method.desc: The string to pass to scipy.optimize.minimize so it knows what to use

desc.disp: Set to True to print convergence messages
desc.xtol: Relative error in solution xopt acceptable for convergence
desc.ftol: Relative error in fun(xopt) acceptable for convergence
desc.maxiter: Maximum number of iterations to perform
desc.maxfev: Maximum number of function evaluations to make
